landing.subtitle: Photobooth on fly, from small gatherings to big venues

printer.bannerText: Novelty! Get your thermal printer for instant memories at your event!

toast.title: Not Found
toast.description: The projection code is not associated with any Flybooth.

footer.featureAsk: Click here to suggest new features

questions.a0: Yes, no fees or account is required to use Flybooth. In addition, the source code is fully available without copyright restrictions.
questions.a1: Dedicated to event organizers, Flybooth is an online photobooth that allows participants to take photos or send messages from their smartphone. The photos and messages can then be projected in real time on the equipment set up by the organizer.
questions.q2: Is it possible to moderate the photos?
questions.a2: In order to limit the manual activity of the organizer during the event, inappropriate photos are automatically deleted. It is important to note that the algorithm is not infallible.
questions.q3: How long are the photos kept?
questions.a3: The photos are kept for 7 days during which participants can review or download them from a dedicated gallery.
questions.q4: How many photos can participants post?
questions.a4: Participants can post up to 1000 photos per event. This limit can be increased by increments of $10/1000 additional photos. More information by email contact@h2t.club.

stepOne.title: Keep the URL of this page safe. This is where you will find access to your gallery and the message wall.

emailButton.label: Send by email
emailButton.toastSuccessDescription: The URL of this page has been sent to the following address:

stepTwo.title: Now access the interface that you will share with your guests so they can add
stepTwo.subtitle: You can also print the QR code below and stick it in strategic places to facilitate access to the interface.

stepThree.title: Here is the content that updates automatically, to project during your event.

stepFour.title: Finally, here is a gallery that you can share with your guests after the event to allow them to download the photos they liked the most. Be careful, the photos are deleted from the server after a week!

stepFive.title: And finally, reset this page for your next event.

hero.title: Instant Thermal Printing for Your Flybooth Event
hero.subtitle: Transform your digital photo experience with our eco-friendly, fast, and affordable thermal printers. Let your guests take home physical memories instantly.

features.title: Why Choose Our Thermal Printers?
features.subtitle: Our thermal printers provide a perfect complement to your Flybooth experience, giving your guests physical takeaways from your digital photobooth.

instantPrinting.title: Instant Printing
instantPrinting.description: Photos print in seconds, giving your guests an immediate keepsake

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Thermal paper is recyclable and our printers use minimal energy

lowEnergy.title: Low Energy
lowEnergy.description: Our printers run efficiently on battery power for hours

costEffective.title: Cost-Effective
costEffective.description: Much cheaper than traditional photo printing for events

fastSetup.title: Fast Setup
fastSetup.description: Connect to your Flybooth in minutes with our simple instructions

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Setting up your Flybooth thermal printer is quick and easy

step1.title: Rent & Receive
step1.description: Choose your package and we'll deliver the printer to your location before your event

step2.title: Connect & Setup
step2.description: Follow our simple instructions to connect the printer to your Flybooth event

step3.title: Print & Enjoy
step3.description: As guests take photos, they'll receive instant printed copies to take home
